page.title: 12Population of Exton.
page.content: The social mix of Exton is influenced by two factors (1)The accessibility of the city of Exeter by road and rail since 1861.(2)The rural character of the surrounds.Exton has become an affluent village with the majority of home-owners in the higher-income brackets.This has affected the age-range in the village,there being a predominance of the over-40's group,who now commute to Exeter by car.Many of the large houses are inter-war and this may explain why Exton has a large percentage of retired people. A second group can be distinguished, again mainly older people,who are linked to the land.This includes local farmers,market gardeners and farm- workers.
